body.name: MANSCAPED® UltraPremium Deodorant, Aluminum-Free Clear Formula, Soft and Comfortable with Cologne-Quality Fragrance for Under Arm Odor Protection, 2.65 oz Stick (1 Pack)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 1 hr 23 mins
features: ULTRA PREMIUM DEODORANT: Our Deodorant has an aluminum-free, clear formula so no marks (or odors) are left in your clothes, it goes on clear and dries clear.

HOW TO USE: Whether you shower first or not (though we sincerely hope you consider it), just give the ol’ pits a couple swipes of the stick. Wait a second to dry, and then you can move on with your day feeling incredibly confident giving hugs, high fives, or just raising your arms in general.

WHO’D WE MAKE THIS FOR: B.O. plagues everyone. It's a simple fact of nature. We all need ways to manage our sweaty arm pockets, which is why we created a deodorant that does just that. Not only does it go on clear, but it’s aluminum-free which means you can say goodbye to those yellow pit stains that are nearly impossible to get out.

MANSCAPED SIGNATURE SCENT: Scented with authentic Refined cologne to mask odor with the scent of light citrus, a hint of sambac jasmine, vetiver, and light woods. As always, our products are paraben-free, cruelty-free, dye-free, and use vegan ingredients.

MISSION: MANSCAPED created its lineup of tools and products to take care of a man's face, body, and important bits. Our products help you maintain by trimming, shaving, cleansing, and treating your skin with care. Our mission is to create superior products to elevate man's grooming experience. We strive to engineer tools and formulations to empower all men to be the best versions of themselves. We take pride in crafting specific products to help men feel more confident, comfortable, and healthy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great aluminum free deodorant. Smells really good and for what it is lasts all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, the perfect deodorant for men.
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this product is literally perfect. The scent is really nice, it does not leave me sweating, it contains natural ingredients safe for use (no aluminum), it lasts all day and the price is literally perfect. I'm a very sensitive person in general and usually when I use the regular brands from retail stores such as old spice or any other product, I gag out and have a crazy allergic reaction to any deodorant / cologne I use. However, this product does not cause any of that to me. I almost never care to write review but I had to come back to write this review to let ya'll know that this is the deodorant that you should be putting on your body compared to other brands that contain chemicals and are potentially harmful for you. 10/10 highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells like a much more expensive product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product, depends on the person skin
reviews.reviewText: Smells great, but don’t last long unlike the other products of the same brand. Unfortunately I develop some rash after a week of use, product capability for work depends on the person useing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After sierra bravo almost doubled their prices I tried Dr squatch which smells good but isn't clear and ruined a couple shirts. I was lost, lonely and..... stinky. After searching high and low, I realized that manscaped has DO for the BO. Its smooth, smells kinda like aqua di gio (but a little more mushy which I love) and is affordable. I'm now secure in my deodorant choice and my shirts can rest easy because they won't get ruined.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s very overrated…
reviews.reviewText: Okay the packaging and targeted ads all over my TikTok telling me to buy this, I did it… twice. It’s very overrated and you can find so much better deodorants because I have to use this constantly and also why does it smell like 🍃 after a few hours, if it wasn’t for the aesthetic packaging I would literally never buy it again but it sucks, it doesn’t last, you have reapply it almost every hour, try again later this is not it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smell and last long
reviews.reviewText: If your trying to moveAway from the aluminum antiperspirants. This might be the best one. GoodSmell nd last long. BeenUsing mine forOver a month and still going. GoodValue forMoney

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It sits on a shelf
reviews.reviewText: After using my Jinga skills to get the lid off of the deodorant. I was greeted with a pleasant scent. Which I expected, the beard care products are awesome. The deodorant however is not the same quality. It hurt going on, it lasted maybe a couple of hours and I have a office job. So now it sits on a shelf. It was a waste of money and will no doubt end up in the trash barely used. Still great beard products, but not so much for the deodorant
It's got a good fragrance. Lasts longer than I thought .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Quality product which speaks for itself.
reviews.reviewText: The subtle and distinctive scent that the product delivers.The roll on serves a complete all purpose function.Underarm,overarm,the chest and the torso.An all around product which is affordable and will last for some time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very appealing product and great service
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this product ‘ I had it in a Manscape pack as it was included in a kit ‘ so that’s why I purchased 2 more of them ‘ thank you
Bought this as a christmas gift and it works great! He works in a hot kitchen all day and it still wont budge by the end of his shift and keeps on smelling great
